job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Founded in 2015 Bowery Farming is on a mission to democratize access to highquality local safe and sustainable produce Bowery builds smart indoor farms near cities growing fresher pesticidefree Protected Produce with bold flavor in precisely controlled environments 365 days a year At the heart of each farm is the proprietary BoweryOS which integrates software hardware sensors AI computer vision systems machine learning models and robotics to orchestrate and automate the entirety of its operations As a result each farm creates far less waste and uses a fraction of the water
